name: tusharbisht.github.io
description: Personal site: public-facing `index.html` showing profile, projects, and blog links. Modern, professional aesthetic with layouts that may change frequently.

intent.primary: Provide a concise public profile, project showcases, and links to writing.
intent.layoutFlexibility: High â€” components and layouts may be rearranged or swapped frequently. Keep content and tokens decoupled from markup.

contentSources.projects: static in HTML or later move to data/projects.json
contentSources.blogs: external links to platforms (Medium/Dev.to) or future local /posts/ folder

templates.recommended: Eleventy (lightweight static templates) or simple partial includes
templates.reason: Allows changing layout/partials without manual edits to `index.html` each time

devWorkflow.preview: Vercel or Netlify for branch previews

howToChangeLayout: Centralize design tokens and move repeated markup into templates/partials. Keep small `data/` files for projects and blog links so `index.html` becomes a renderer of content + templates.
notes: Store this file at repo root. CI or local scripts can read `repo-context.json` to generate previews or enforce token consistency.
